name: Buckingham Fountain in a Dream
description:
Sometimes you visit a real place and the cells, DNA, fabric of that place get under your skin and into your dreams. This is a view of such a thing. A fountain where a feeling more than you can say, sensual in nature, abstract in design, makes its way into the subconscious where sentient artifacts buzz and it is hard to explain what it all means to a lover or a friend. 

Created with video hardware, a CRT rescan and mixed with virtual reality drawing. 

3360 x 2100 pixels
